name: Shahmeer Kamran
summary: AI Engineer with expertise in fine-tuning LLMs, RAG, and LangChain. Proficient in Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, with experience in API design, cloud deployment, and AI model integration. Strong focus on scalable, high-performance applications.

experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
description: Fine-tuned LLMs for improved chatbot responses and user experience.
Preprocessed conversational data and extracted features for intent classification.
Built and evaluated models using PyTorch and scikit-learn.

experience.title: MERN Stack Developer
description: Developed responsive front-end interfaces using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
Integrated APIs to enhance user experience with dynamic components.

projects.title: RAG-Based Content Evaluation
description: Utilized BERT embeddings for similarity matching in evaluation questions.

projects.title: Private Document Summarization with RAG, LangChain, and LLMs
description: Integrated IBM Watsonx.ai and Hugging Face embeddings for summarization tasks.
